response.message: "limit" must be less than or equal to 20

results.quote: I believe that one defines oneself by reinvention. To not be like your parents. To not be like your friends. To be yourself. To cut yourself out of stone.
results.author: Henry Rollins

results.quote: I have looked into your eyes with my eyes. I have put my heart near your heart.
results.author: Pope John XXIII

results.quote: Your present circumstances don't determine where you can go they merely determine where you start.
results.author: Nido Qubein

results.quote: I can't change the direction of the wind, but I can adjust my sails to always reach my destination.
results.author: Jimmy Dean

results.quote: What we achieve inwardly will change outer reality.
results.author: Plutarch

results.quote: And now, this is the sweetest and most glorious day that ever my eyes did see.
results.author: Donald Cargill

results.quote: The essential elements of giving are power and love - activity and affection - and the consciousness of the race testifies that in the high and appropriate exercise of these is a blessedness greater than any other.
results.author: Mark Hopkins

results.quote: Great hopes make great men.
results.author: Thomas Fuller

results.quote: On the recollection of so many and great favours and blessings, I now, with a high sense of gratitude, presume to offer up my sincere thanks to the Almighty, the Creator and Preserver.
results.author: William Bartram

results.quote: I know why I am here and my only real focused goal is to live each day to the fullest and to try and honor God and be an encouragement to others. What the future holds is firmly in God's hands, and I am very happy about that!
results.author: Ken Hensley

results.quote: A place for everything, everything in its place.
results.author: Benjamin Franklin

results.quote: Enthusiasm moves the world.
results.author: Arthur Balfour

results.quote: In oneself lies the whole world and if you know how to look and learn, the door is there and the key is in your hand. Nobody on earth can give you either the key or the door to open, except yourself.
results.author: Jiddu Krishnamurti

results.quote: Let us dream of tomorrow where we can truly love from the soul, and know love as the ultimate truth at the heart of all creation.
results.author: Michael Jackson

results.quote: Give light and people will find the way.
results.author: Ella Baker

results.quote: Grace is the beauty of form under the influence of freedom.
results.author: Friedrich Schiller

results.quote: Hope is some extraordinary spiritual grace that God gives us to control our fears, not to oust them.
results.author: Vincent McNabb

results.quote: A compliment is something like a kiss through a veil.
results.author: Victor Hugo

results.quote: It is in your moments of decision that your destiny is shaped.
results.author: Tony Robbins

results.quote: Don't limit yourself. Many people limit themselves to what they think they can do. You can go as far as your mind lets you. What you believe, remember, you can achieve.
results.author: Mary Kay Ash

results.quote: The purpose of art is washing the dust of daily life off our souls.
results.author: Pablo Picasso

results.quote: In art, the hand can never execute anything higher than the heart can imagine.
results.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

results.quote: True art is characterized by an irresistible urge in the creative artist.
results.author: Albert Einstein

results.quote: Art enables us to find ourselves and lose ourselves at the same time.
results.author: Thomas Merton

results.quote: Life imitates art far more than art imitates Life.
results.author: Oscar Wilde

results.quote: The purpose of art is washing the dust of daily life off our souls.
results.author: Pablo Picasso

results.quote: In art, the hand can never execute anything higher than the heart can imagine.
results.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

results.quote: True art is characterized by an irresistible urge in the creative artist.
results.author: Albert Einstein

results.quote: Art enables us to find ourselves and lose ourselves at the same time.
results.author: Thomas Merton

results.quote: Life imitates art far more than art imitates Life.
results.author: Oscar Wilde

results.quote: Painting is silent poetry, and poetry is painting that speaks.
results.author: Simonides

results.quote: Art is the tree of life. Science is the tree of death. God is Jesus.
results.author: Blake, William

results.quote: Art is not a handicraft, it is the transmission of feeling the artist has experienced.
results.author: Tolstoy, Leo

results.quote: What garlic is to food, insanity is to art.
results.author: Unknown

results.quote: A critic is a legless man who teaches running.
results.author: Unknown

results.quote: I passionately hate the idea of being with it, I think an artist has always to be out of step with his time.
results.author: Welles, Orson

results.quote: It is only an auctioneer who can equally and impartially admire all schools of art.
results.author: Wilde, Oscar

results.quote: A work of art is the unique result of a unique temperament.
results.author: Wilde, Oscar

results.quote: Another unsettling element in modern art is that common symptom of immaturity, the dread of doing what has been done before.
results.author: Wharton, Edith

results.quote: There are two lasting bequests we can give our children:  One is roots. The other is wings.
results.author: Carter Jr., Hodding

results.quote: Love means to love that which is unlovable; or it is no virtue at all.
results.author: Chesterton, G.K.

results.quote: Our greatest glory consists not in never falling, but in rising every time we fall.
results.author: Confucius

results.quote: Dream as if you'll live forever.  Live as if you'll die today.
results.author: Dean, James

results.quote: How we spend our days is, of course, how we spend our lives.
results.author: Dillard, Annie

results.quote: Believe you can and you're halfway there.
results.author: Theodore Roosevelt

results.quote: If you accept the expectations of others, especially negative ones, then you never will change the outcome.
results.author: Michael Jordan

results.quote: Clouds come floating into my life, no longer to carry rain or usher storm, but to add color to my sunset sky.
results.author: Rabindranath Tagore

results.quote: What we achieve inwardly will change outer reality.
results.author: Plutarch

results.quote: Happiness resides not in possessions, and not in gold, happiness dwells in the soul.
results.author: Democritus

results.quote: If a country is to be corruption free and become a nation of beautiful minds, I strongly feel there are three key societal members who can make a difference. They are the father, the mother and the teacher.
results.author: Abdul Kalam

results.quote: We cease loving ourselves if no one loves us.
results.author: De Sta?l, Madame

results.quote: Unable are the Loved to die For Love is Immortality.
results.author: Dickinson, Emily

results.quote: Love, with very young people, is a heartless business. We drink at that age from thirst, or to get drunk; it is only later in life that we occupy ourselves with the individuality of our wine.
results.author: Dinesen, Isak

results.quote: The one who loves least controls the relationship.
results.author: Anon.

results.quote: If there is anything better than to be loved it is loving.
results.author: Anon.

results.quote: Love built on beauty, soon as beauty, dies.
results.author: Donne, John

results.quote: Love is agrowing, to full constant light; and his first minute, after noon, is night.
results.author: Donne, John

results.quote: O, if thou car'st not whom I love alas, thou lov'st not me.
results.author: Donne, John

results.quote: Gravity is not responsible for people falling in love.
results.author: Einstein, Albert

results.quote: All mankind loves a lover.
results.author: Emerson, Ralph Waldo

results.quote: Love won't be tampered with, love won't go away. Push it to one side and it creeps to the other.
results.author: Erdrich, Louise

results.quote: Love must not touch the marrow of the soul. Our affections must be breakable chains that we can cast them off or tighten them.
results.author: Euripides

results.quote: He is not a lover who does not love forever.
results.author: Euripides

results.quote: Pleasure of love lasts but a moment, Pain of love lasts a lifetime.
results.author: Florian, Jean Pierre Claris

results.quote: He that falls in love with himself will have no rivals.
results.author: Franklin, Benjamin

results.quote: Love makes the time pass. Time makes love pass.
results.author: French proverb

results.quote: There is hardly any activity, any enterprise, which is started out with such tremendous hopes and expectations, and yet which fails so regularly, as love
results.author: Fromm, Erich

results.quote: Love is union with somebody, or something, outside oneself, under the condition of retaining the separateness and integrity of one's ownself.
results.author: Fromm, Erich

results.quote: Hatred is blind, as well as love.
results.author: Fuller, Thomas

results.quote: A coward is incapable of exhibiting love; it is the prerogative of the brave.
results.author: Gandhi, Mahatma

results.quote: Whoso loves Believes the impossible.
results.author: Browning, Elizabeth Barrett

results.quote: If thou must love me, let it be for nought<
results.author: Browning, Elizabeth Barrett

results.quote: Love is energy of life.
results.author: Browning, Robert

results.quote: Love is composed of a single soul inhabiting two bodies.
results.author: Aristotle

results.quote: I have decided to stick with love. Hate is too great a burden to bear.
results.author: Martin Luther King, Jr.

results.quote: Affection is responsible for nine-tenths of whatever solid and durable happiness there is in our lives.
results.author: C. S. Lewis

results.quote: Immature love says: 'I love you because I need you.' Mature love says 'I need you because I love you.'
results.author: Erich Fromm

results.quote: Where there is love there is life.
results.author: Mahatma Gandhi

results.quote: Keep love in your heart. A life without it is like a sunless garden when the flowers are dead.
results.author: Oscar Wilde

results.quote: Love is energy of life.
results.author: Browning, Robert

results.quote: If you wish to be loved, show more of your faults than your virtues.
results.author: Bulwer-Lytton, Edward Robert

results.quote: Tis sweet to know there is an eye will mark our coming, and look brighter when we come.
results.author: Byron, Lord

results.quote: Yes, Love indeed is light from heaven;  A spark of that immortal fire with angels shared, by Allah given to lift from earth our low desire.
results.author: Byron, Lord

results.quote: Let none think to fly the danger for soon or late love is his own avenger.
results.author: Byron, Lord

results.quote: Some cause happiness wherever they go others whenever they go.
results.author: Oscar Wilde

results.quote: If you want others to be happy, practice compassion. If you want to be happy, practice compassion.
results.author: Dalai Lama

results.quote: A table, a chair, a bowl of fruit and a violin what else does a man need to be happy?
results.author: Albert Einstein

results.quote: The purpose of our lives is to be happy.
results.author: Dalai Lama

results.quote: Our greatest happiness does not depend on the condition of life in which chance has placed us, but is always the result of a good conscience, good health, occupation, and freedom in all just pursuits.
results.author: Thomas Jefferson

results.quote: I have looked into your eyes with my eyes. I have put my heart near your heart.
results.author: Pope John XXIII

results.quote: I have looked into your eyes with my eyes. I have put my heart near your heart.
results.author: Pope John XXIII

results.quote: Your time is limited, so don't waste it living someone else's life. Don't be trapped by dogma - which is living with the results of other people's thinking. Don't let the noise of others' opinions drown out your own inner voice. And most important, have the courage to follow your heart and intuition.
results.author: Steve Jobs

results.quote: You gain strength, courage, and confidence by every experience in which you really stop to look fear in the face. You are able to say to yourself, 'I lived through this horror. I can take the next thing that comes along.'
results.author: Eleanor Roosevelt

results.quote: I learned that courage was not the absence of fear, but the triumph over it. The brave man is not he who does not feel afraid, but he who conquers that fear.
results.author: Nelson Mandela

results.quote: Courage is what it takes to stand up and speak courage is also what it takes to sit down and listen.
results.author: Winston Churchill

results.quote: There are no easy answers' but there are simple answers. We must have the courage to do what we know is morally right.
results.author: Ronald Reagan

results.quote: Courage is the most important of all the virtues, because without courage you can't practice any other virtue consistently. You can practice any virtue erratically, but nothing consistently without courage.
results.author: Maya Angelou

results.quote: Courage is grace under pressure.
results.author: Ernest Hemingway

results.quote: We must build dikes of courage to hold back the flood of fear.
results.author: Martin Luther King, Jr.

results.quote: Courage is resistance to fear, mastery of fear, not absence of fear.
results.author: Mark Twain

results.quote: He who is not courageous enough to take risks will accomplish nothing in life.
results.author: Muhammad Ali

results.quote: Courage is not simply one of the virtues, but the form of every virtue at the testing point.
results.author: C. S. Lewis

results.quote: Courage is being scared to death... and saddling up anyway.
results.author: John Wayne

results.quote: Don't Make Assumptions. Find the courage to ask questions and to express what you really want. Communicate with others as clearly as you can to avoid misunderstandings, sadness and drama. With just this one agreement, you can completely transform your life.
results.author: Miguel Angel Ruiz

results.quote: You will never do anything in this world without courage. It is the greatest quality of the mind next to honor.
results.author: Aristotle

results.quote: Efforts and courage are not enough without purpose and direction.
results.author: John F. Kennedy

results.quote: Love begins at home, and it is not how much we do... but how much love we put in that action.
results.author: Mother Teresa

results.quote: Love does not begin and end the way we seem to think it does. Love is a battle, love is a war love is a growing up.
results.author: James A. Baldwin

results.quote: Can miles truly separate you from friends... If you want to be with someone you love, aren't you already there?
results.author: Richard Bach

results.quote: A woman knows the face of the man she loves as a sailor knows the open sea.
results.author: Honore de Balzac

results.quote: A man is already halfway in love with any woman who listens to him.
results.author: Brendan Francis

results.quote: Love is a force more formidable than any other. It is invisible - it cannot be seen or measured, yet it is powerful enough to transform you in a moment, and offer you more joy than any material possession could.
results.author: Barbara de Angelis

results.quote: Time is too slow for those who wait, too swift for those who fear, too long for those who grieve, too short for those who rejoice, but for those who love, time is eternity.
results.author: Henry Van Dyke

results.quote: Do all things with love.
results.author: Og Mandino

results.quote: A kiss makes the heart young again and wipes out the years.
results.author: Rupert Brooke

results.quote: Absence diminishes mediocre passions and increases great ones, as the wind extinguishes candles and fans fires.
results.author: Francois de La Rochefoucauld

results.quote: I was born with an enormous need for affection, and a terrible need to give it.
results.author: Audrey Hepburn

results.quote: At the touch of love everyone becomes a poet.
results.author: Plato

results.quote: Love is our true destiny. We do not find the meaning of life by ourselves alone - we find it with another.
results.author: Thomas Merton

results.quote: Love yourself first and everything else falls into line. You really have to love yourself to get anything done in this world.
results.author: Lucille Ball

results.quote: We love life, not because we are used to living but because we are used to loving.
results.author: Friedrich Nietzsche

results.quote: Love is a better teacher than duty.
results.author: Albert Einstein

results.quote: Come live in my heart, and pay no rent.
results.author: Samuel Lover

results.quote: Love is always bestowed as a gift - freely, willingly and without expectation. We don't love to be loved we love to love.
results.author: Leo Buscaglia

results.quote: Love is like war: easy to begin but very hard to stop.
results.author: H. L. Mencken

results.quote: If you press me to say why I loved him, I can say no more than because he was he, and I was I.
results.author: Michel de Montaigne

results.quote: Being deeply loved by someone gives you strength, while loving someone deeply gives you courage.
results.author: Lao Tzu

results.quote: Keep love in your heart. A life without it is like a sunless garden when the flowers are dead.
results.author: Oscar Wilde

results.quote: Friends can help each other. A true friend is someone who lets you have total freedom to be yourself - and especially to feel. Or, not feel. Whatever you happen to be feeling at the moment is fine with them. That's what real love amounts to - letting a person be what he really is.
results.author: Jim Morrison

results.quote: Sometimes the heart sees what is invisible to the eye.
results.author: H. Jackson Brown, Jr.

results.quote: Love is like a friendship caught on fire. In the beginning a flame, very pretty, often hot and fierce, but still only light and flickering. As love grows older, our hearts mature and our love becomes as coals, deep-burning and unquenchable.
results.author: Bruce Lee

results.quote: Love is composed of a single soul inhabiting two bodies.
results.author: Aristotle

results.quote: I have decided to stick with love. Hate is too great a burden to bear.
results.author: Martin Luther King, Jr.

results.quote: Affection is responsible for nine-tenths of whatever solid and durable happiness there is in our lives.
results.author: C. S. Lewis

results.quote: Immature love says: 'I love you because I need you.' Mature love says 'I need you because I love you.'
results.author: Erich Fromm

results.quote: Where there is love there is life.
results.author: Mahatma Gandhi

results.quote: We're born alone, we live alone, we die alone. Only through our love and friendship can we create the illusion for the moment that we're not alone.
results.author: Orson Welles

results.quote: A loving heart is the beginning of all knowledge.
results.author: Thomas Carlyle

results.quote: A man reserves his true and deepest love not for the species of woman in whose company he finds himself electrified and enkindled, but for that one in whose company he may feel tenderly drowsy.
results.author: George Jean Nathan

results.quote: I have found the paradox, that if you love until it hurts, there can be no more hurt, only more love.
results.author: Mother Teresa

results.quote: For it was not into my ear you whispered, but into my heart. It was not my lips you kissed, but my soul.
results.author: Judy Garland

results.quote: A kiss is a lovely trick designed by nature to stop speech when words become superfluous.
results.author: Ingrid Bergman

results.quote: Let us always meet each other with smile, for the smile is the beginning of love.
results.author: Mother Teresa

results.quote: A flower cannot blossom without sunshine, and man cannot live without love.
results.author: Max Muller

results.quote: If you live to be a hundred, I want to live to be a hundred minus one day so I never have to live without you.
results.author: A. A. Milne

results.quote: Gravitation is not responsible for people falling in love.
results.author: Albert Einstein

results.quote: Love begins at home, and it is not how much we do... but how much love we put in that action.
results.author: Mother Teresa

results.quote: Love does not begin and end the way we seem to think it does. Love is a battle, love is a war love is a growing up.
results.author: James A. Baldwin

results.quote: Can miles truly separate you from friends... If you want to be with someone you love, aren't you already there?
results.author: Richard Bach

results.quote: A woman knows the face of the man she loves as a sailor knows the open sea.
results.author: Honore de Balzac

results.quote: A man is already halfway in love with any woman who listens to him.
results.author: Brendan Francis

results.quote: Love is a force more formidable than any other. It is invisible - it cannot be seen or measured, yet it is powerful enough to transform you in a moment, and offer you more joy than any material possession could.
results.author: Barbara de Angelis

results.quote: Time is too slow for those who wait, too swift for those who fear, too long for those who grieve, too short for those who rejoice, but for those who love, time is eternity.
results.author: Henry Van Dyke

results.quote: Do all things with love.
results.author: Og Mandino

results.quote: A kiss makes the heart young again and wipes out the years.
results.author: Rupert Brooke

results.quote: Absence diminishes mediocre passions and increases great ones, as the wind extinguishes candles and fans fires.
results.author: Francois de La Rochefoucauld

results.quote: Every man has his own courage, and is betrayed because he seeks in himself the courage of other persons.
results.author: Emerson, Ralph Waldo

results.quote: Some have been thought brave because they were afraid to run away.
results.author: English Proverb

results.quote: This is courage in a man: to bear unflinchingly what heaven sends.
results.author: Euripides

results.quote: I count him braver who overcomes his desires than him who conquers his enemies; for the hardest victory is over self.
results.author: Aristotle

results.quote: Courage that grows from constitution often forsakes a man when he has occasion for it courage which arises from a sense of duty acts in a uniform manner.
results.author: Addison, Joseph

results.quote: Give us the fortitude to endure the things which cannot be changed, and the courage to change the things which should be changed, and the wisdom to know one from the other.
results.author: Hart, Oliver J.

results.quote: Courage is grace under pressure.
results.author: Hemingway, Ernest

results.quote: It is better to die on your feet than to live on your knees.
results.author: Ibarruri, Dolores

results.quote: The greatest test of courage on earth is to bear defeat without losing heart.
results.author: Ingersoll, Robert Green

results.quote: One man with courage makes a majority.
results.author: Jackson, Andrew
